title: How to Use Teleporter in Zombies

steps.headline: The teleporter is located next to the backstage theatre, which is in the far room of the map.
steps.description: You need to switch on the power for the stage curtain to raise and the teleporter to be visible.

steps.headline: To activate the teleporter, first stand inside the larger teleporter 'hub' and press the action button (X button on Xbox).
steps.description: Now run to the second part of the teleporter which is located in the starting room. Stand on the teleporter and press the action button again.

steps.headline: Now, finally run back to the teleporter hub, stand inside and press the action button again.
steps.description: You will be transported to the pack a punch room where you can upgrade your weapon..

text: The teleporter is located next to the backstage theatre, which is in the far room of the map. You need to switch on the power for the stage curtain to raise and the teleporter to be visible. To activate the teleporter, first stand inside the larger teleporter 'hub' and press the action button (X button on Xbox). Now run to the second part of the teleporter which is located in the starting room. Stand on the teleporter and press the action button again. Now, finally run back to the teleporter hub, stand inside and press the action button again. You will be transported to the pack a punch room where you can upgrade your weapon..
